question: Which E-Commerce company has committed for transition to electric vehicles and join EV100 initiative?
explanation:
Walmart-owned Flipkart has recently committed for a complete transition to electric vehicles (EVs), by joining the Climate Groupâ€™s global electric mobility initiative, EV100.
Under the EV100 initiative, the companies committed towards fast-tracking the transition to EVs and make the electric transport feasible by the year 2030. Flipkart will place service contracts, install charging infrastructure and conduct awareness programmes.
